New Records: Dawid Malan scored a career-best 140 in ODIs
Reece Topley took four wickets on debut
Malan's 140 is his highest ODI score
Key Match Events: Malan's century set the tone for England's win
Topley's four-wicket haul turned the game
Mark Wood's pace contributed to England's victory
Pre-Game Insights: England was sleepwalking into the tournament
A storm the night before affected the match environment
Post-Match Reflections: Malan silenced critics with his performance
Jonny Bairstow and Joe Root contributed significantly
Root became England's all-time highest scorer at World Cups
Miscellaneous Highlights: England's total of 364 was a high score
The match was potentially earth-shattering for England's campaign
Others: The match was a significant win for England's World Cup campaign
